rooms.description: Vastu-compliant entrance with a reception desk and storage area. Features are designed to welcome positive energy.
Spacious living room with Brutalist concrete elements, large windows following Vastu principles for natural light and air flow.
Modern dining space integrated within the living area to promote family interaction, designed using exposed concrete finishes.
Functional kitchen with state-of-the-art appliances and Brutalist design elements, positioned in the southeast for Vastu energy balance.
Dedicated servant's quarters with basic amenities, designed as a separate zone to ensure privacy while maintaining overall aesthetic coherence.
Two-car garage integrated into the ground floor plan with reinforced concrete structure, aligning with Brutalist design and Vastu energy considerations by placing it in the northwest area.

openings.description: Large windows in the living room to allow maximum natural light and ventilation.
